img_above_text:
As you emerge in the wide open space, a Giant Shigandang will appear.
### Yaoguai King - Giant Shigandang
img_below_text:
Unfortunately, despite its size, you will need to be on foot during the fight. The key to defeating this enormous rocky monster is to head for its fits and attack the blue crystals you can on them.
![Five Skandhas \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Five_Skandhas_%2822%29.png)

content.text:

img_summary: The image depicts the Yaoguai King, a massive rocky creature known as the Giant Shigandang, towering over the player character in a desolate, open landscape. This scene sets the stage for an intense battle, where the player must fight on foot and strategically target the blue crystals on the monster's fists to defeat it. The dark, foreboding environment emphasizes the creature's immense size and power, highlighting the challenge ahead.
